Hi, we just rolled out two new annotations. From immediately every result will have a MGRS and a Maidenhead location reference code. If you’re not familiar with those codes Wikipedia is a great place to start: (MGRS, Maidenhead)

Another small step to try to make lives easy for developers.

As ever, details of all annotations can be found .. on the API documentation page. Please let us know what other annotations you’d like to see. 

thanks, and happy geocoding
